alert.note: Alert for Ocracoke Island (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 30 at 2:38AM EST until January 30 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Oceanside areas along Ocracoke Island. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS... Minor ocean overwash possible along portions of NC 12 especially during times of high tide. Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
